Text:
Thanks Nepotu.

People who download this classic NBA show your appreciation by SEEDING as much as you can . 

We don't want this uploader (Nepotu) to go away. He used to upload other sporting events but no one helped him seed so he stopped. 

Show some respect to him and others who enjoy the classic games ...SEED... and he will give more and everyone will benefit.

Thanks mma4me! It's a great help. If you want me to upload something or seed until you can download, please let me know. I will upload also Moto GP from Sachsenring (the 125cc race had videofinish - very rare). Thanks man!
Many, many thanks to all the seeders and especially to mma4me! Great help!
